resources.string: To win, you must visit all 13 locations on the map of Maynooth. They will be marked with red circles before you visit them, and marked green after you visit them. Each location will either identify itself as the crime scene, or eliminate a weapon or suspect.\n\t Once you have visited all locations, return to the location identified as the crime scene and fill in the suspect and weapon which you DID NOT find at any location.

In the middle of the night, you awake with a start to the sound of a blood- curdling scream in the distance. Frightened, you make sure that your door and window are locked. You peer out the window, but see nothing, and return to bed uneasily. The next morning, you still wonder what the source of the scream was. You wish that you could ask your flatmates if they heard anything, but campus is almost entirely empty since it is study week. \n\tOn the way to the library, you see a number of Gardai, which is peculiar. After seeing a fifth garda, you stop to ask why there are so many on campus. He answers \"Oh, just some rowdy kids. Nothing to worry about.\" You\'re certain that there\'s a cover-up going on, since the last time you saw even one garda in Maynooth was- Well, long enough ago that you can\'t recall.\n\t There\'s a murderer on the loose, and only you can stop him.
